ingredients.ingredient: 2 bunches kale, stems removed and leaves finely shredded
½ cup sunflower seeds, or to taste (Optional)

cookingTips: Use undrained crushed pineapple to create a naturally sweet and juicy dressing
Shred kale very finely to allow dressing to coat each strand
Let salad sit for 10 minutes after dressing to allow kale to soften and absorb flavors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can tropical fruit flavors brighten a healthy salad?
